# Load packages

```{r load-libs, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)  # data wrangling
```


# Simulate data


```{r}
low_spread <- 
  tibble(var = rnorm(n = 100),
         id = 1:100,
         type = "low spread")
high_spread <-
  tibble(var= rnorm(n = 100, sd = 10),
         id = 1:100,
         type = "high spread")
```

```{r}
d <-
  low_spread %>% 
  bind_rows(high_spread)
```


# Plot 1

```{r}
ggplot(d) +
  aes(x = id, y = var) +
  facet_wrap(~ type) +
  geom_hline(yintercept = 0, color = "grey40") +
  geom_point() +
  theme_minimal()
```


# Plot 2

```{r}
ggplot(d) +
  aes(x = type, y = var) +
  geom_boxplot()
```
